replies.body:
Looks great! Thanks for posting! However, there are a couple link errors.

The Dragon image isn't working. It's linking to the experimental tooltips post.
The Surprise Party image is linking to Melyn's montage.
The ICU image is linking to Crafting the Client: The Play Loop.

Good catches. Working on the fix now!

Edit: Should be good now. Thanks for letting me know. :D

Now the title of the Surprise Party link links to Melyn's montage.

EDIT: Wooo, all fixed!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

(There needs to be a dancing emoji, BUT THIS WILL DO!)

Thanks for the links, but i think you used the wrong word in "You're a season 3 player and a season 6 player has come to change you everything has changed. What is the biggest shock?" Should the first 'change' be tell, or am I missing a joke? :P
When will Featured Games be available to watch from the client once more?
can we get a new map new mode new iteam new champ can we play new thing?

> hey why is riot going down the drain? like becoming one of the worst companys in the world? just curious

Makes me laugh !  

Like it is, and becoming the Most popular company.  I'd say I'm sorry but I'm not!
hey why is riot going down the drain? like becoming one of the worst companys in the world? just curious
Logged in just to down-vote this.
